RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Helio HEC time based query V1.16.25
RESOURCE.INFO: SELECT ngdc_ssc.HEC_id,ngdc_ssc.time_start,ngdc_ssc.nstn_a,ngdc_ssc.nstn_b,ngdc_ssc.nstn_c,ngdc_ssc.nsi FROM ngdc_ssc WHERE time_start>='2003-02-01T00:00:00' AND time_start<='2003-02-10T00:00:00' LIMIT 100 OFFSET 0

FIELD.name: time_start
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Begin time for sudden storm commencement.

FIELD.name: nstn_a
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of stations reporting an A event. Letter A -- denotes very remarkable event observed.

FIELD.name: nstn_b
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of stations reporting a B event. Letter B -- denotes fair, ordinary, but unmistakable event observed.

FIELD.name: nstn_c
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of stations reporting a C event. Letter C -- denotes very poor, doubtful event observed.

FIELD.name: nsi
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of stations reporting an "si" event. Letters "si" -- sudden impulse event (sudden magnetic change which could not be classified as ssc (sudden storm commencement), bs, etc.)
